data.name: ScriptEvent
desc: script event that gets delivered whenever a script event takes place.
For that to happen, a "ScriptEventDescriptor" must be registered at and attached to an object by an XEventAttacherManager.

items.name: ScriptCode
lines: The code has to correspond with the language defined by ScriptType.

items.name: ScriptType
lines: type of the script language as string; for example, "Basic" or "StarScript".
